/* com.coway.trust.biz.homecare.services.plan.impl.HcDTSubGroupListMapper.selectDtSubGroupList */ WITH TEMP AS ( SELECT A.CODE , B.NAME , D.MEM_CODE || ' - ' || D.NAME MEM_CODE , D.MEM_ID , C.CT_SUB_GRP , C.LAST_GRP_CODE , D.MEM_CODE MEMCODE , D.MEM_TYPE FROM SYS0005M A INNER JOIN ORG0001D B ON B.BRNCH = A.BRNCH_ID INNER JOIN ORG0005D C ON C.MEM_ID = B.MEM_ID AND C.MEM_LVL IN ('3', '4') INNER JOIN ORG0001D D ON D.MEM_ID = C.MEM_ID AND D.STUS = '1' WHERE A.TYPE_ID = #{branchTypeId} union SELECT A.CODE , B.NAME , D.MEM_CODE || ' - ' || D.NAME MEM_CODE , D.MEM_ID , C.CT_SUB_GRP , C.LAST_GRP_CODE , D.MEM_CODE MEMCODE , D.MEM_TYPE FROM SYS0005M A INNER JOIN ORG0001D B ON B.BRNCH = A.BRNCH_ID INNER JOIN ORG0005D C ON C.MEM_ID = B.MEM_ID AND C.MEM_LVL IN ('3', '4') INNER JOIN ORG0001D D ON D.MEM_ID = C.MEM_ID AND D.STUS = '1' inner join sys0047m e on e.USER_NAME = B.MEM_CODE inner join sys0045m f on f.USER_ID = e.USER_ID WHERE A.TYPE_ID = '43' and f.ROLE_ID IN (SELECT TO_NUMBER(CODE) FROM SYS0094M C WHERE C.IND = 'ACI_ROLE') ), TEMP2 AS ( SELECT * FROM SVC0054M WHERE MAJOR_GRP = 1 ) SELECT T1.CODE , T1.NAME , T1.MEM_CODE , T1.MEM_ID , CASE WHEN T1.MEM_TYPE = 5758 THEN T2.CT_SUB_GRP END AS CT_SUB_GRP , CASE WHEN T1.MEM_TYPE = 6672 THEN T2.CT_SUB_GRP END AS LT_SUB_GRP , CASE WHEN T1.MEM_TYPE = 3 THEN T2.CT_SUB_GRP END AS AC_SUB_GRP , T1.LAST_GRP_CODE FROM TEMP T1, TEMP2 T2
WHERE T1.MEM_ID = T2.MEM_ID(+)
AND LOWER(T1.CODE) = LOWER(#{dscCode})
AND LOWER(T1.MEM_CODE) = LOWER(#{memCode})
AND LOWER(T1.MEM_CODE) = LOWER(#{DTMemId})
AND LOWER(T2.CT_SUB_GRP) = LOWER(#{dtSubGrp})
AND T1.MEM_TYPE = #{orgType}
ORDER BY T1.CODE

/* com.coway.trust.biz.homecare.services.plan.impl.HcDTSubGroupListMapper.selectDTMByDSC */ SELECT A.MEM_CODE CODE_ID , A.MEM_CODE || '-' || A.NAME CODE_NAME FROM ORG0001D A, ORG0005D B, SYS0005M C WHERE A.MEM_ID = B.MEM_ID AND A.BRNCH = C.BRNCH_ID AND B.MEM_LVL = '2' AND A.STUS = '1'
AND C.CODE = #{groupCode}

/* com.coway.trust.biz.homecare.services.plan.impl.HcDTSubGroupListMapper.selectDTSubGroupDscList */ SELECT DISTINCT DT_SUB_GRP CODE_ID , DT_SUB_GRP CODE_NAME
FROM SYS0064M WHERE DT_BRNCH_CODE = #{branchCode} AND DT_SUB_GRP IS NOT NULL ORDER BY DT_SUB_GRP ASC

/* com.coway.trust.biz.homecare.services.plan.impl.HcDTSubGroupListMapper.selectDTSubGroupDscList */ SELECT DISTINCT LT_SUB_GRP CODE_ID , LT_SUB_GRP CODE_NAME
FROM SYS0064M WHERE LT_BRNCH_CODE = #{branchCode} AND LT_SUB_GRP IS NOT NULL ORDER BY LT_SUB_GRP ASC

/* com.coway.trust.biz.homecare.services.plan.impl.HcDTSubGroupListMapper.selectAssignDTSubGroup */ SELECT B.DT_SUB_GRP AS CT_SUB_GRP , A.ASIGN_FLAG , A.MAJOR_GRP FROM (SELECT * FROM SVC0054M WHERE MEM_ID = REPLACE(#{memId},' ','') ) A , (SELECT DISTINCT DT_SUB_GRP FROM SYS0064M WHERE DT_SUB_GRP IS NOT NULL AND DT_BRNCH_CODE = #{branch} ) B WHERE A.CT_SUB_GRP(+) = B.DT_SUB_GRP ORDER BY A.CT_SUB_GRP ASC
